ch0140_00_sakaki/0101_0701_02_10:
Keep your guard up around this place, kid.
Some bad guys like me have got their eyes
on you.
ch0140_00_sakaki/0601_0701_01_10:
Hmph... You take raising your Pokémon really
seriously, huh. I can tell.
ch0140_00_sakaki/0601_0701_02_10:
I’m the same way. If you don’t maintain your
tools, they don’t last as long. They start to lose
their strength after a while.
ch0140_00_sakaki/0601_0701_03_10:
Adults have their own way of thinking about this
stuff, kid.
ch0140_00_sakaki/0601_0702_01_10:
Pokémon have value because of the way we
use them.
ch0140_00_sakaki/0601_0702_02_10:
You may not agree with me now, but someday
when you’re older, you’ll understand.
ch0140_00_sakaki/0602_0701_01_10:
My record’s been clean as a whistle since I
arrived on Pasio.
ch0140_00_sakaki/0602_0701_02_10:
Being surrounded by all this beautiful nature,
watching sync pairs work together in harmony...
It’s put a damper on my desire to sow chaos.
ch0140_00_sakaki/0602_0701_03_10:
Don’t believe me? Hmph... How much of what
people say do you think is true anyway?
ch0140_00_sakaki/0602_0702_01_10:
If society labels someone as evil, does it mean
everything that person says or does is wrong?
Is that what you believe?
ch0140_00_sakaki/0602_0702_02_10:
In a society like that, any minority viewpoint
could easily be considered evil. Is that the world
you want to live in?
ch0140_00_sakaki/0602_0702_03_10: Hmph... Sorry, that got a little deep.
ch0140_00_sakaki/0603_0701_01_10:
I’m a mean old man. I could be lying and
deceiving you right now, and you wouldn’t
even know it.
ch0140_00_sakaki/0603_0701_02_10:
The world is made up of people who deceive
each other every day. We lie and we get lied to.
That’s how it works.
ch0140_00_sakaki/0603_0701_03_10:
It’ll all start to click for you someday when you’re
older, kid.
ch0140_00_sakaki/0603_0702_01_10:
Not all adults are mean old liars, but there are
some who are.
ch0140_00_sakaki/0603_0702_02_10:
But there are kids out there like that, too.
The world’s full of all kinds of different people.
ch0140_00_sakaki/0604_0701_01_10:
Hmph. Everything seems to be going according
to plan...
ch0140_00_sakaki/0604_0701_02_10:
Oh, it’s you... Having fun eavesdropping?
You must be so curious about what plans I
was referring to.
ch0140_00_sakaki/0604_0701_03_10:
Want some advice? Keep your nose out of
grown-up business, kid.
ch0140_00_sakaki/0604_0702_01_10:
Want to know more about my plans, do you?
Hmph... What makes you think I’d tell a brat
like you what I’m up to?
ch0140_00_sakaki/0604_0702_02_10:
Keep poking your nose where it doesn’t belong,
and you’ll find yourself in a world of pain, kid.
ch0140_00_sakaki/0604_0702_03_10:
That’s the kind of world I live in. Take my advice
and go back where you came from before you
regret it.
ch0140_00_sakaki/0605_0701_01_10:
In the past, I brought various organizations
under my own control to form Team
Rainbow Rocket.
ch0140_00_sakaki/0605_0701_02_10:
But I was forced to step down thanks to a certain
kid who got in my way. I’m in the middle of a
new plot as we speak.
ch0140_00_sakaki/0605_0701_03_10:
To be honest, you remind me a lot of that kid,
[Name:PlayerNickname ].
ch0140_00_sakaki/0605_0702_01_10: You’ve managed to pique my interest, kid.
ch0140_00_sakaki/0605_0702_02_10:
You and your partner... You’re destined to keep
growing stronger, and I look forward to watching
it happen.
ch0140_00_sakaki/0605_0702_03_10:
Ever thought about utilizing all that strength and
potential as my right hand?
ch0140_00_sakaki/1701_0701_01_10: You can have this. Hope it’s useful.
ch0140_00_sakaki/1701_0702_01_10:
You get to figure out what to do with it
on your own.
ch0140_00_sakaki/2501_0701_01_10:
Pokémon are a business enterprise. Unless both
parties are profiting, nothing gets done.
ch0140_00_sakaki/2501_0701_02_10:
And by profit, I mean money. When it comes to
business, there’s no room for things like friendship
or caring for one another.
ch0140_00_sakaki/2501_0701_03_10:
I understand where you’re coming from, though.
I can appreciate your viewpoint.
ch0140_00_sakaki/2501_0702_01_10:
It’s good that we all want different things.
That’s how things get done in a business.
ch0140_00_sakaki/2501_0702_02_10:
The world should be full of different opinions
and viewpoints.
ch0140_00_sakaki/2501_0702_03_10:
I just wonder if you’ll ever come over to my side
one day.
ch0140_00_sakaki/2511_0701_01_10:
People like there to be clear lines between
good and evil, right and wrong.
ch0140_00_sakaki/2511_0701_02_10:
When I carry out my evil schemes, some people
in this world profit. Some people are helped in
other ways.
ch0140_00_sakaki/2511_0701_03_10:
You probably think it’s wrong to cause trouble
for people and Pokémon in general.
ch0140_00_sakaki/2511_0701_04_10:
But when people wave their self-righteousness
around like a giant flag, that causes its own
trouble, too.
ch0140_00_sakaki/2511_0701_05_10:
Right, wrong, good, evil... People think everything
has to be black and white, but that’s just not how
it is.
ch0140_00_sakaki/2511_0702_01_10: There’s one thing I do know...
ch0140_00_sakaki/2511_0702_02_10:
I’m drawn to strength. I like power. And that’s
because neither strength nor power are inherently
good or evil.
ch0140_00_sakaki/2511_0702_03_10:
The strong will win. It’s got nothing to do with
right or wrong... That’s the real truth.
ch0140_00_sakaki/3001_0701_01_10:
Don’t allow yourself to be used by others.
Stay vigilant. Even in the morning.
ch0140_00_sakaki/3002_0701_01_10:
If I need to brainstorm, I do it in the morning.
That’s when I come up with my greatest schemes.
ch0140_00_sakaki/3003_0701_01_10:
It’s awfully bright outside right now...
Makes it difficult to work in the shadows.
ch0140_00_sakaki/3004_0701_01_10:
Pasio is an incredible piece of land.
Perhaps one day it will belong to... Ahem.
ch0140_00_sakaki/3005_0701_01_10:
Remember...villains tend to make
their moves in the shadow of darkness.
ch0140_00_sakaki/3006_0701_01_10:
Isn’t it past your bedtime, kid?
Keep your nose out of grown-up business.
